Interface Brick

All Known Implementing Classes:
IBrick, JBrick, LBrick, OBrick, SBrick, SlowBrick, TBrick, ZBrick
public interface Brick
Represents a Tetris brick, defining the common behavior for all brick types.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    BrickType
    getBrickType()
    Gets the type of the brick.
    List<int[][]>
    getShapeMatrix()
    Gets the shape matrix of the brick.

  • Method Details

    • getShapeMatrix

      List<int[][]> getShapeMatrix()
      Gets the shape matrix of the brick. Each `int[][]` in the list represents a rotation of the brick.
      Returns:
      a list of 2D integer arrays representing the brick's shapes.

    • getBrickType

      BrickType getBrickType()
      Gets the type of the brick.
      Returns:
      the brick type.
